name: VR Roller Coaster Simulator 2016
description:
Take a brake from pressure and stress by Riding on VR Roller Coaster in beautiful theme park .
Enjoy ride on VR Roller Coaster. Realize yourself in a Train that is running on a Rolling track.
Sometime you may even scare because you will really feel like a Roller Coaster Slide, Sharp turns and Slopes.
You will also realize beautiful view of city from height.

How to Play:
- Press play Button
- Put your device into VR glasses
- Use revolving chair or stand in open place
- You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis
- Also visualize up/down view



Features:
- VR based 3D Environment
- 360 degree rotation
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Real Sound effects
- No time Limit, unlimited play and fun
- Play it anytime,anywhere!



-Exciting VR roller coaster experience with loops and dives
Experience the real life sensation of this 3D roller coaster and an exciting environment with your mobile virtual reality headse
